analysis.description:
TFH.startDate (/unique_contracts/0x766aeaeccb1330e143fb7a0aeb77ecc969b31e92.sol#107-108) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_contracts/0x766aeaeccb1330e143fb7a0aeb77ecc969b31e92.sol#213-225)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x766aeaeccb1330e143fb7a0aeb77ecc969b31e92.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x766aeaeccb1330e143fb7a0aeb77ecc969b31e92.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x766aeaeccb1330e143fb7a0aeb77ecc969b31e92.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
